rukus.text: By those that dive and extract
And by those [winds?] that briskly pass by
And by the floaters [clouds?] that float by
And then overtake others, leaving the latter behind
And then execute a [divine] Order [to rain]
[There shall come] a Day when a violent convulsion will convulse [the world]
The subsequent convulsion shall follow the first
Hearts that Day will be throbbing
Sights that Day will be lowered
They ask, "Shall we be brought back to life [after death]
Even when we are crumbled bones
They say, "This in that event would be a damaging return
It will but be a single blast
And then they all will come awake [from their deep slumber of death]
Has Moses' story come down to you
When his Lord called out to him by the sacred valley of Tuwa
Go to Pharaoh! He has indeed exceeded all bounds
You then ask him, `Would you like to reform
Would you allow me to guide you to your Lord, so that you fear Him
Moses then showed him the great Sign [staff turning into snake and hand turning white]
But he [Pharaoh] refused to acknowledge the divine Sign and obey Allah
He then turned his back hastily
To summon and collect his people
He then proclaimed to them, "I am your lord supreme
Allah then seized him for punishment both in the Hereafter and here
There is indeed a lesson in this for those who fear Allah
